metadata.description: Meet Morgan. A cool cat exploring the digital world around him as he learns about Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies. Join Morgan on his learning journey and discover the power of knowledge and all the exciting places he plans to visit. Follow Morgan as he makes new friends, discovers how Blockchain technology can improve his life and spends tokens for out of this world experiences and merchandise. The collection of Morgan NFT’s is randomly generated and stylistically curated. Each collection will be limited to 20 minted NFTs and is built on the Ethereum Blockchain.
metadata.name: The start of Morgan’s journey #2
